fruits.name: Mango
fruits.description: Sweet and juicy tropical fruit with a smooth, orange flesh. Excellent source of vitamin A and C.

fruits.name: Dragon Fruit
fruits.description: Vibrant pink or white flesh with small black seeds. Sweet and refreshing flavor.

fruits.name: Guava
fruits.description: Sweet and tangy fruit with a soft, pink or white flesh. Rich in vitamin C and antioxidants.

fruits.name: Strawberry
fruits.description: Sweet and juicy berries with a bright red color. Excellent source of vitamin C and antioxidants.

fruits.name: Apple
fruits.description: Crisp and sweet with a firm texture. Available in various colors like red, green, and yellow.

fruits.name: Banana
fruits.description: Soft and creamy with a slightly sweet flavor. Highly nutritious and convenient to eat.

comments.comment: Dragon Fruit is so exotic, love the taste!
comments.author: ExoticEater

promotions.name: Fresh Fruit Bundle
promotions.label: Special
promotions.description: Enjoy a bundle of the freshest seasonal fruits at a special price. Limited time offer!

leaders.name: Peter Pear
leaders.description: Our CFO, Peter, has a passion for promoting healthy eating through a variety of fresh fruits. He believes in the power of fruits to enhance well-being and brings that philosophy to our fruit shop.

leaders.name: Dhanasekaran Berry
leaders.description: Dhanasekaran, or Danny as he is fondly called, is dedicated to exploring and combining flavors to create unique fruit experiences. His love for berries inspires our diverse menu.

feedback.message: I absolutely love your Mango! It's the best I've ever had.
